metadata.title: CVE-2014-3946 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The query caching functionality in the Extbase Framework component in TYPO36.2.0 before 6.2.3 does not properly validate group permissions, whichallows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary queries via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
